# spaAlign

![](reference/figures/spaAlign_hex.gif)

Aligns sparse plug-based measurements (e.g., TOC, porosity, XRD
mineralogy) to a high-resolution reference depth grid (e.g., HHXRF)
using rule-based one-dimensional interpolation without extrapolation.
Produces depth-consistent tables for stratigraphic comparison,
visualization, and chemofacies/reservoir-quality analysis.

# Package index

## Core functions

- [`spa_align()`](https://omodolor.github.io/spaAlign/reference/spa_align.md)
  : Stratigraphic Plug Alignment (SPA)
